com.elsevier.s3

Class SimpleStorageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elsevier.s3.SimpleStorageService

  • public class SimpleStorageService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with static methods to put/get/delete object in an S3 bucket as well as static methods for getting the length of the object and last modified date.
    Author:
    Darin McBeath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleStorageService()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Clear the S3 client.

      static java.lang.String getObject(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.String key)
      Get the object (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.
      static java.util.Date getObjectLastModifed(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.String key)
      Get the object last modified (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.

      Get the object length (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initialize the S3 client

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear the S3 client.

      • putObject

        public static void putObject(java.lang.String bucketName,
             java.lang.String key,
             java.lang.String content,
             java.lang.String contentType)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Put the object (with the key value) into the specified S3 bucket. Will also set the content type, content length, encoding, and encryption.
        Parameters:
        bucketName - S3 bucket name
        key - S3 key value for the content
        content - content to put into S3
        contentType - Content type (such as text/xml)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getObject

        public static java.lang.String getObject(java.lang.String bucketName,
                         java.lang.String key)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Get the object (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.
        Parameters:
        bucketName - S3 bucket name
        key - S3 key value
        Returns:
        S3 object contents as String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deleteObject

        public static void deleteObject(java.lang.String bucketName,
                java.lang.String key)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Delete the object (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.
        Parameters:
        bucketName - S3 bucket name
        key - S3 key value
        Throws:

                                  java.lang.String key)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Get the object last modified (with key value) from the specified S3 bucket.
        Parameters:

        key - S3 key value
        Returns:

        Throws:
